creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: ribbed roof, glazed green; round elements in three rows on one long side; blue glazed element on top edge and 3/4 way down each side edge; circular hole on each short side
markings: [7018], on two stickers, one on top of the other, on top edge of one short side; \'01 (57)/M175878\', underneath, behind opposite short side
portfolio: From From a large tileworks retinue
title: House Roof
